{{champion:112}}** Ok, Battlecast Cho’gath’ speakers are on, max volume *ahem* Attention inferior constructs. Return to me my newest Battlecast creation and I will let you live to see the Glorious Evolution.**

{{champion:126}} I don’t suppose anyone here has a speaker? 

{{champion:72}} **I have one build in.  **

{{champion:126}} Thanks. *ahem* Attention Viktor, we are not going to hand Skarner over to you. He has sided with us and we will fight with him to keep him away from you. 

{{champion:112}} **If you do not return my creation back to me I will destroy not only you but you entire city. 
**

{{champion:126}} Oh yeah? You and what army? 

{{champion:112}} **I’m glad you ask. ARISE MY ARMY!!!!**

{{champion:126}} Oh right..he has Yorick’s shovel.

WTF Rito, I bought Arctic Warfare Caitlyn almost a year ago, and NOW you put her on sale? I DEMAND a full refund, the deed to my own private island, and an hour alone with Ahri in my bedroom.

Disappointing skin rotation with the exception of Kog'Maw. The skins are really weak (how is Rageborn Mundo a 975 skin when it doesn't even look that good and has no new particle effects or animations?), nobody likes Quinn, and just about everybody already owns Cho'Gath.
{{champion:133}} "*I'd keep my head down if i were you*"
{{champion:33}} Ok...
Quinn is an amazing champion, just because you don't know how to utilize her skills doesn't mean nobody likes her. Get your shit straight buddy.

{{champion:133}} is a great top and can be played as a decent assassin mid though she is not in a good spot in bot lane.  Her moves can be unreliable sometimes and not work properly though when all of those bugs are fixed she will be in a good spot as she counters a good amount of popular picks
Sometimes, I like to lock myself in the bathroom, cover myself in peanut butter, and then stick 9 towels up my butt and pretend I'm Ahri.
